body.name: Notebook: Unlined/Plain Notebook - Large (8.5 x 11 inches) - 106 Pages || Pastel Blue Softcover
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 19 hrs 27 mins
body.description: This minimalist and classic notebook is a wonderful multi-purpose journal for sketching, jotting down thoughts, and writing notes. The notebook is made with a flexible matte laminated softback cover, which helps repel liquids. Therefore, the notebook is durable to withstand any adventure. Check out the specifications for more information. If you would like to see a sample of the notebook, click on the "Look Inside" feature. Specifications:Layout: UnlinedDimensions: 8.5" x 11"Soft, matte laminated paperback coverCover color: Pastel blue106 pages or 53 sheetsPaper Weight: 60lb text/90 GSM Acid-Free PaperBinding: Perfect For more information on our products, such as pictures of notebooks’ inside pages, check out our website: www.lilanotebook.comIf you have any questions or concerns, please send us an email at lilanotebooks@gmail.com or lilanotebook@gmail.comShowcase your notebook by using the hashtag #lilanotebooks or #lilanotebook. You may appear on our Instagram @lilanotebook

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very nice notebook
reviews.reviewText: loved how the pages of the notebook are numbered. beautiful color. great quality to write or draw in. very nice size. like that it's easy to bend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect and High Quality
reviews.reviewText: The paper is high quality, I use ink pens and they don't bleed through at all. The notebook is 8.5x11 and has many pages that are numbered. I like the color a lot too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Perfect notebook. Has page numbering inside. Paper is thick enough for colored ballpoint to not leak through. Love the variety of cover colors available. The paper is a beautiful cream and not a bright white, which is my preference. Perfect for when I need to take notes that includes calculations, drawings and writing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Extremely good value!
reviews.reviewText: Great value! I like how the pages are slightly cream colored and not blaring bright white. Fantastic for a sketchbook. Only criticism is there’s small page numbers at the bottom that are unnecessary and may get in the way of your sketches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It has page numbers!
reviews.reviewText: I bought mine to use as part of a bullet journal project, and I was pleased to see that it has page numbers. (I ordered one of their dotted notebooks, too.) These are printed just like regular books as part of a print-on-demand system, so I think the binding will hold up on both notebooks really well. I can't wait to start using them, and I'm definitely going to get others when I fill these up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I've purchased this twice. I wanted a clear notebook for journaling and reflecting. This product achieves my needs with its simplicity. This is much more affordable than Moleskin notebooks. However, it'd be nicer if the cover didn't feel too slippery and the pages were more durable (like Moleskin's). Good enough for its affordable price, nonetheless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars good product but damaged
reviews.reviewText: the notebook is a nice soft material and i love the color i got. everything is perfect inside however, i received some light damage to the notebook upon arrival. good product if it would’ve been damage free it would’ve gotten 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great unlined notebook
reviews.reviewText: perfect for organic chemistry and if you normally like taking notes on printer paper. paper is not white tho its more like a beige/cream. and its see through kind of so prob wouldnt be good for drawing. i write all mynotes in gel and glitter gel pens so the ink is a more rich (but still doesnt bleed through). 50 pages total (100 front and back). almost done w mine im buying another

This is exactly what I was looking for in a blank page notebook! The item came in very good condition and the pages are really thick and smooth allowing for a better usage of pens and markers on the pages. Overall I am satisfied with the quality of these notebooks. I also really liked the soft texture of the book covers for these notebooks. The price is very reasonable for such a high quality item! Would recommend this for anyone looking for a blank page notebook.
I quaderni sono ottimi e hanno una carta davvero bella

Sturdy binding, good quality paper with only a little bleed through. The spin required snapping to make it more flexible for the pages, but once I did that the pages lay mostly flat without the spine taking up too much paper at the binding edge.
